speaker: ['Phoebe Buffay']
transcript: Hi guys!

speaker: ['#ALL#']
transcript: Hey, Pheebs! Hi!

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: Hey. Oh, oh, how'd it go?

speaker: ['Phoebe Buffay']
transcript: Um, not so good. He walked me to the subway and said 'We should do this again!'

speaker: ['#ALL#']
transcript: Ohh. Ouch.

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: What? He said 'we should do it again', that's good, right?

speaker: ['Monica Geller']
transcript: Uh, no. Loosely translated 'We should do this again' means 'You will never see me naked'.

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: Since when?

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: Since always. It's like dating language. Y'know, like 'It's not you' means 'It is you'.

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: Or 'You're such a nice guy' means 'I'm gonna be dating leather-wearing alcoholics and complaining about them to you'.

speaker: ['Phoebe Buffay']
transcript: Or, or, y'know, um, 'I think we should see other people' means 'Ha, ha, I already am'.

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: And everybody knows this?

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: Yeah. Cushions the blow.

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: Yeah, it's like when you're a kid, and your parents put your dog to sleep, and they tell you it went off to live on some farm.

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: That's funny, that, no, because, uh, our parents actually did, uh, send our dog off to live on a farm.

speaker: ['Monica Geller']
transcript: Uh, Ross.

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: What? Wh- hello? The Millners' farm in Connecticut? The Millners, they had this unbelievable farm, they had horses, and, and rabbits that he could chase and it was- it w- .....Oh my God, Chi Chi!

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: "So how does it feel knowing you're about to die?"

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: "Warden, in five minutes my pain will be over. But you'll have to live with the knowledge that you sent an honest man to die."

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: Hey, that was really good!

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: Thanks! Let's keep going.

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: Okay. "So. Whaddya want from me, Damone, huh?"

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: "I just wanna go back to my cell. 'Cause in my cell, I can smoke."

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: "Smoke away."

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: I think this is probably why Damone smokes in his cell alone.

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: What?

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: Relax your hand!

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: Not so much!

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: Whoah!

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: Hey!

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: Hey!

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: Alright, now try taking a puff.

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: Alright.. okay. No. Give it to me.

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: No no no, I am not giving you a cigarette.

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: It's fine, it's fine. Look, do you wanna get this part, or not? Here.

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: Don't think of it as a cigarette. Think of it as the thing that's been missing from your hand. When you're holding it, you feel right. You feel complete.

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: Y'miss it?

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: Nah, not so much. Alright, now we smoke. Oh.. my.. God.

speaker: ['Monica Geller']
transcript: Hi.. how was the game?

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: Well..

speaker: ['#ALL#']
transcript: WE WON!! Thank you! Yes!

speaker: ['Monica Geller']
transcript: Fantastic! I have one question: How is that possible?

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: Alan.

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: He was unbelievable. He was like that-that-that Bugs Bunny cartoon where Bugs is playing all the positions, right, but instead of Bugs it was first base-Alan, second base-Alan, third base-...

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: I mean, it-it was like, it was like he made us into a team.

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: Yep, we sure showed those Hassidic jewellers a thing or two about softball..

speaker: ['Monica Geller']
transcript: Can I ask you guys a question? D'you ever think that Alan is maybe.. sometimes..

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: What?

speaker: ['Monica Geller']
transcript: ..I dunno, a little too Alan?

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: Well, no. That's impossible. You can never be too Alan.

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: Yeah, it's his, uh, innate Alan-ness that-that-that we adore.

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: I personally could have a gallon of Alan.

speaker: ['Phoebe Buffay']
transcript: Hey, Lizzie.

speaker: ['Lizzy']
transcript: Hey, Weird Girl.

speaker: ['Phoebe Buffay']
transcript: I brought you alphabet soup.

speaker: ['Lizzy']
transcript: Did you pick out the vowels?

speaker: ['Phoebe Buffay']
transcript: Yes. But I left in the Ys. 'Cause, y'know, "sometimes y". Uh, I also have something else for you.

speaker: ['Lizzy']
transcript: Saltines?

speaker: ['Phoebe Buffay']
transcript: No, but would you like a thousand dollars and a football phone?

speaker: ['Lizzy']
transcript: What? Oh my God, there's really money in here.

speaker: ['Phoebe Buffay']
transcript: I know.

speaker: ['Lizzy']
transcript: Weird Girl, what are you doing?

speaker: ['Phoebe Buffay']
transcript: No, I want you to have it. I don't want it.

speaker: ['Lizzy']
transcript: No, no, I ha-I have to give you something.

speaker: ['Phoebe Buffay']
transcript: Oh, that's fine, no.

speaker: ['Lizzy']
transcript: Would you like my tin-foil hat?

speaker: ['Phoebe Buffay']
transcript: No. 'Cause you need that. No, it's okay, thanks.

speaker: ['Lizzy']
transcript: Please, let me do something.

speaker: ['Phoebe Buffay']
transcript: Okay, alright, you buy me a soda, and then we're even. Okay?

speaker: ['Lizzy']
transcript: Okay.

speaker: ['Phoebe Buffay']
transcript: Okay.

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: A thumb?!

speaker: ['#ALL#']
transcript: Eww!

speaker: ['Phoebe Buffay']
transcript: I know! I know, I opened it up and there it was, just floating in there, like this tiny little hitch-hiker!

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: Well, maybe it's a contest, y'know? Like, collect all five?

speaker: ['Phoebe Buffay']
transcript: Does, um, anyone wanna see?

speaker: ['#ALL#']
transcript: Nooo!

speaker: ['#ALL#']
transcript: Oh, hey, don't do that! Cut it out!

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: It's worse than the thumb!

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: Hey, this is so unfair!

speaker: ['Monica Geller']
transcript: Oh, why is it unfair?

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: So I have a flaw! Big deal! Like Joey's constant knuckle-cracking isn't annoying? And Ross, with his over-pronouncing every single word? And Monica, with that snort when she laughs? I mean, what the hell is that thing? ...I accept all those flaws, why can't you accept me for this?

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: ...Does the knuckle-cracking bother everybody?

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: Well, I-I could live without it.

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: Well, is it, like, a little annoying, or is it like when Phoebe chews her hair?

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: Oh, now, don't listen to him, Pheebs, I think it's endearing.

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: Oh, "you do, do you"?

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: You know, there's nothing wrong with speaking correctly.

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: "Indeed there isn't"... I should really get back to work.

speaker: ['Phoebe Buffay']
transcript: Yeah, 'cause otherwise someone might get what they actually ordered.

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: Ohh-ho-hooohhh. The hair comes out, and the gloves come on.

speaker: ['Monica Geller']
transcript: Did you ever go out with a guy your friends all really like?

speaker: ['Paula']
transcript: No.

speaker: ['Monica Geller']
transcript: Okay.. Well, I'm going out with a guy my friends all really like.

speaker: ['Paula']
transcript: Waitwait.. we talking about the coyotes here? All right, a cow got through!

speaker: ['Monica Geller']
transcript: Can you believe it? ...Y'know what? I just don't feel the thing. I mean, they feel the thing, I don't feel the thing.

speaker: ['Paula']
transcript: Honey.. you should always feel the thing. Listen, if that's how you feel about the guy, Monica, dump him!

speaker: ['Monica Geller']
transcript: I know.. it's gonna be really hard.

speaker: ['Paula']
transcript: Well, he's a big boy, he'll get over it.

speaker: ['Monica Geller']
transcript: No, he'll be fine. It's the other five I'm worried about.

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: Do you have any respect for your body?

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: Don't you realise what you're-you're doing to yourself?

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: Hey, y'know, I have had it with you guys and your cancer and your emphysema and your heart disease. The bottom line is, smoking is cool, and you know it.

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: Chandler? It's Alan, he wants to speak to you.

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: Really? He does? Hey, buddy, what's up! Oh, she told you about that, huh. Well, yeah, I have one now and then. Well, yeah, now. Well, it's not that big- ..well, that's true,.. Gee, y'know, no-one- no-one's ever put it like that before. Well, okay, thanks!

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: God, he's good.

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: If only he were a woman.

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: Yeah.

speaker: ['Alan']
transcript: Wow.

speaker: ['Monica Geller']
transcript: I'm, I'm really sorry.

speaker: ['Alan']
transcript: Yeah, I'm sorry too. But, I gotta tell you, I am a little relieved.

speaker: ['Monica Geller']
transcript: Relieved?

speaker: ['Alan']
transcript: Yeah, well, I had a great time with you.. I just can't stand your friends.

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: Remember when we went to Central Park and rented boats?.. That was fun.

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: Yeah. He could row like a viking.

speaker: ['Monica Geller']
transcript: Hi.

speaker: ['#ALL#']
transcript: Mmm.

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: So how'd it go?

speaker: ['Monica Geller']
transcript: Oh, y'know..

speaker: ['Phoebe Buffay']
transcript: Did he mention us?

speaker: ['Monica Geller']
transcript: He said he's really gonna miss you guys.

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: You had a rough day, huh.. c'mere.

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: ...That's it. I'm getting cigarettes.

speaker: ['#ALL#']
transcript: No no no!

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: I don't care, I don't care! Game's over! I'm weak! I've gotta smoke! I've gotta have the smoke!

speaker: ['Phoebe Buffay']
transcript: If you never smoke again I'll give you seven thousand dollars!

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: Yeah, alright.
